title: Capsicum Coconut ðŸŒ´ Curry / Green Bell pepper Curry
content:
Ingredients: Capsicum/ Green Bell pepper - Diced - 1 cup Sliced onion - 2 tb sp Coriander chopped - 1 tb sp Salt - to taste Masala for curry: Green chillies - 4 Coriander seeds - 1 teaspoon Poppy seeds - 1 teaspoon Garlic cloves - 2 Fresh grated coconut - 2 tb sp Onion - diced - 1 tb sp For Tempering: Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/4 tea spoon Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Oil - 1 tb sp Procedure: Make Masala for curry:
  • In a mixer grinder add green chillies, garlic cloves, poppy seeds, coriander seeds and make fine paste
  • Next add fresh grated coconut, onion and salt
  • Make smooth paste
Curry Preparation:
  • Add oil In frying pan on medium heat
  • Add tempering
  • Add sliced onion. Cook for one minute
  • Add diced capsicum/ Green Bell pepper
  • Saute for 2 to 5 mins
  • Cook them nicely when capsicum gets cut easily with spatula
  • Add Masala paste and mix it well
  • Saute 2 mins
  • Add chopped coriander and saute
  • Serve it with Rice and DalÂ Menthi Akku Pappu/ Menthi dal tadka/ Fenugreek leaves dal
